name: BIURO PROMOCJI ZEGLUGI MORSKIEJ BLISKIEGO ZASIEGU
membership: SPC Poland is the member of the European Shortsea Network, website: www.shortsea.info.
goal: SPC Poland's main task is the promotion of short sea shipping on the national and local level, promotion of the maritime sector in cooperation with other maritime organizations.
euInitiatives: SPC Poland is a member of an Expert Group of the European Union (Focal Points and Short Sea Promotion Centres for Shortsea Shipping and Motorways of the Sea)
